content:
The Docosan AI Doctor App is provided for reference and informational purposes only. It is not a diagnostic tool, and its recommendations are based solely on the input provided by users. It is not intended to replace professional medical advice, diagnosis, or treatment. Always seek the advice of your physician or another qualified health provider with any questions you may have regarding a medical condition. Do not disregard professional medical advice or delay in seeking it because of something you have read or received from the Docosan AI Doctor App.

  If you are experiencing a medical emergency, call emergency services immediately.

  By using the Docosan AI Doctor App, you understand and agree that Docosan is not responsible or liable for any claim, loss, or damage resulting from its use, and that you use it at your own risk.

  By continuing to use the Docosan AI Doctor App, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agreed to these Terms of Use & Disclaimer
